faq.question: What types of documents can I review?
faq.answer: Any PDF document: contracts, legal agreements, business reports, proposals, RFPs, compliance documents, financial statements, and more.

faq.question: Does it replace human review?
faq.answer: No, it accelerates human review. AI extracts key information so you can focus on critical sections instead of reading every page.

faq.question: Can it identify risks and red flags?
faq.answer: Yes! You can ask specific questions like 'What are the liability clauses?' or 'Are there any unusual terms?' to identify potential risks.

faq.question: How secure is my document data?
faq.answer: Enterprise-grade encryption. Your documents are never shared or used for training. SOC 2 compliant.

faq.question: Can my team collaborate on reviews?
faq.answer: Yes! Team plan ($49/mo) includes shared workspaces, comments, and collaborative review features.

faq.question: What's included in the free plan?
faq.answer: 5 document reviews per month up to 50 pages each. Perfect for trying the tool before upgrading.
